summary: REQ-1 appears implemented via cache-busting query string on the module script URL in `frontend/index.html` and addition of no-cache meta directives. No other BuildRequest requirements are evidenced as missing. One extra, unrequested change is updating `project_state.json`.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project tracking metadata in `project_state.json` unrelated to the requested cache-busting change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for deterministic cache-busting changes in `frontend/index.html`; it does not request modifications to project metadata/state files.
